ai_sprite.name: villager
ai_sprite.dialog: Rumor has it there are warlords who have learned a dangerous tactic called Assassin. Though more difficult to execute, it instantly kills a foe and all his soldiers when successful.

ai_sprite.name: villager2
ai_sprite.dialog: Rumor has it there is a relic somewhere that allows the person holding it to use his own tactics and tactical points instead of his party's.

ai_sprite.name: woman3
ai_sprite.dialog: Rumor has it there is a secret society quietly infiltrating our government.

ai_sprite.name: villager
ai_sprite.dialog: Rumor has it there is a great Lamanite strategist who answers to no one and wanders the wilderness.

ai_sprite.name: merchant
ai_sprite.dialog: Rumor has it you woke me up from my nap. Go away.
